title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Unleash the Power of Connectivity on Your Italian Adventure with the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter!

**Product Title:**
[3-Pack] VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter with Dual USB & American Outlets - Type L

**Product Description:**

Embark on your journey to the enchanting landscapes of Italy, the vibrant streets of Chile, or the historic corners of Vatican City with peace of mind! The VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter ensures your electronic devices stay charged and ready to capture every moment. Designed specifically for travelers from the USA with the need to power American devices, this adapter is your ultimate travel companion.

**Key Features:**

- **Universal Compatibility:** Comes with a standard North American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plug input, making it suitable for most U.S. electronic devices.
- **Max Power Capacity:** Safely supports devices up to 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 amperes, ensuring your gadgets are powered without risk.
- **Dual USB Ports:** Charge your smartphones, tablets, and power banks quickly with dual USB ports delivering up to 2.4A of power.
- **Grounded for Safety:** Equipped with a 3 prong grounded plug to keep you and your devices safe from electrical surges.
- **Compact & Portable:** Its ultra-light and compact design (2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches) makes it a breeze to pack and use on the go.
- **Widely Compatible Countries:** Designed for use in Italy, Chile, Uruguay, and other countries using the Type L plug standard.
- **Certified Quality:** CE and FCC certifications ensure compliance with international safety standards.
- **Peace of Mind:** Comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, ready to assist you.
- **Voltage Compatibility:** Suitable for 100V-250V wide voltage devices. Note: This is NOT a converter; dual voltage support is required for devices.
- **Ideal for Multiple Devices:** Perfect for charging cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electric products while traveling.

**Product Specifications:**

- Input Compatibility: Standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plug
- Max Capacity: 2500W, 250V, 10A
- USB Output: Up to 2.4A
- Plug Type: Grounded 3 prong plug (Type L)
- Compatible Countries: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Lybia, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, Vatican City
- Design: Ultra-light and compact
- Dimensions: 2.8" x 2.6" x 2.3"
- Certifications: CE, FCC
- Warranty: 12 months

**In the Box:**

- 3 x VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter (Type L)
- User Manual

Transform the way you travel with the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter. Now, staying connected while exploring new destinations is as simple as plugging in and powering up! Add this essential travel accessory to your cart today and charge ahead into your next adventure with confidence.

**Experience Hassle-Free Charging Abroad with the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter 3-Pack**

Travel with confidence and stay connected no matter where you are in Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and other compatible countries! Introducing the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter, designed to provide a seamless charging experience for American electronic devices in countries with Type L outlets.

**Key Features:**

- **Universal Compatibility:** Each adapter in this 3-pack features 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, accommodating a Standard North American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plug.
- **High Capacity:** With a max capacity of 2500 watts (250 volts, 10 amps), you can power up devices like cell phones, tablets, and power banks without worry.
- **Dual USB Ports:** The two USB ports provide up to 2.4A of charging power, making it easy to simultaneously charge multiple devices.
- **Grounded for Safety:** The grounded 3 prong plug ensures safety for you and your devices.
- **Compact Design:** These ultra-light and compact adapters measure just 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches, making them perfect for travel without taking up too much luggage space.
- **Broad Compatibility:** Works in countries like Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City.
- **Quality Assured:** CE and FCC certified, you can trust in the safety and reliability of your adapter.
- **Friendly Customer Service:** Should you need assistance, our customer service is as friendly as it gets.
- **12-Month Warranty:** Enjoy peace of mind with a 12-month warranty on these adapters.
- **Voltage Compatibility:** These adapters are compatible with 100V-250V wide voltage devices and are ideal for dual voltage products.

Please note that this is not a voltage converter. Ensure your devices are compatible with the 100V-250V range or are low-power electronics.

Stay powered up and ready to explore with the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter 3-Pack. Make your overseas travels smoother with a reliable charging solution for all your gadgets. Get yours today and make travel inconveniences a thing of the past!

**Travel with Ease: VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter**

- **High Max Capacity**: With a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 ampere, the VINTAR adapter can handle most of your electronic needs without a hitch.
- **Dual USB Ports**: Charge your USB devices with ease thanks to the dual USB ports that offer up to 2.4A output, perfect for your cell phone, tablet, or power bank.
- **Grounded for Safety**: The grounded 3 prong plug ensures a safe connection, keeping your devices protected while in use.
- **Compact Design**: At only 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches, this ultra-light adapter won't weigh down your luggage, making it a hassle-free travel accessory.
- **Wide Voltage Compatibility**: The adapter is suitable for 100V-250V wide voltage devices, making it versatile for use with dual voltage electronics.
- **CE and FCC Certified**: Rest assured of the quality as each adapter is CE and FCC certified, ensuring they meet high safety and performance standards.

- **12-Month Warranty**: Each purchase comes with a 12-month warranty, giving you peace of mind with every use.

**Important Note**: This product is NOT A CONVERTER. Ensure your devices support 100V-250V dual voltage, especially if they are not low-power electronics.

Travel with confidence and keep your devices powered up with the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter. Ideal for travelers from the USA visiting Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and other countries with Type L outlets. Get your 3-pack today and make your travel experience a breeze!
